t: Backup and Restore FAQ - Amazon Customer Service
s: Yes. You can disable Backup and Restore for any Amazon account registered on your device by going to Settings > Device Options > Backup & Restore and tapping "OFF". Once disabled, backup data currently associated with your device and Amazon account will be deleted.
